resources.string: "Saline Singularity Scouting Application 2017. Made by Grant Davis and Gavin Severance\n"

This Page is for Scouting durring and after the match. Press the Start Match button to begin. Durring the event press the button for each activity. After the match describe any penalties and add comments describing any extra details. When finished press the finish button and you will be take back to the main menu.
